name: Foodium
shortDescription: Foodium is a sample food blog Android application built to demonstrate the use of modern-android-development tools - (Kotlin, Coroutines, Flow, Dagger 2/Hilt, Architecture Components, MVVM, Room, Retrofit, Moshi, Material Components)
longDescription: Foodium is a sample food blog Android application built to demonstrate the use of modern-android-development tools - (Kotlin, Coroutines, Flow, Dagger 2/Hilt, Architecture Components, MVVM, Room, Retrofit, Moshi, Material Components)
